name: Gglob - Beta Preview
description:
---->  Welcome to Gglob!  <----

- Gglob is the name of the Glob 2A Planetary System In which your crew were send to start new life on the Exo Planet "Spurth".. but due to some mysterious ship failure, you ended up crashing on Spurth's Moon "Roger".. alone in the dark.

- You're gonna need to find a way to escape to Spurth, Meet with SSC (Spurth Space Center) discover the alien life there to serve your purpose and honor the death of your crew members! 

- But most importantly.. you must find out the reason behind your ship failure by analyzing the hard drive you extracted from the ship!

 <  Thank you for Playing!  >
